com.zhonghu.sip.api

类 SipUri

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zhonghu.sip.api.SipUri

  • public final class SipUri
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for Sip uri manipulation in java space. Allows to parse sip uris and check it.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  SipUri.ParsedSipContactInfos
      Holder for parsed sip contact information.
      static class  SipUri.ParsedSipUriInfos
      Holder for parsed sip uri information.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.lang.String encodeUser(java.lang.String user) 
      static Uri forgeSipUri(java.lang.String scheme, java.lang.String contact) 
      static java.lang.String getCanonicalSipContact(java.lang.String sipContact)
      Transform sip uri into something that doesn't depend on remote display name For example, if you give "Display Name" It will return sip:user@domain.com
      static java.lang.String getCanonicalSipContact(java.lang.String sipContact, boolean includeScheme)
      Transform sip uri into something that doesn't depend on remote display name
      static java.lang.String getDisplayedSimpleContact(java.lang.CharSequence uri)
      Return what should be display as caller id for this sip uri This is the merged and fancy way fallback to uri or user name if needed

      Get extract a phone number from sip uri if any available

    • 方法详细资料

      • parseSipContact

        public static SipUri.ParsedSipContactInfos parseSipContact(java.lang.String sipUri)
        Parse a sip contact
        参数:
        sipUri - string sip contact
        返回:
        a ParsedSipContactInfos which contains uri parts. If not match return the object with blank fields

      • getDisplayedSimpleContact

        public static java.lang.String getDisplayedSimpleContact(java.lang.CharSequence uri)
        Return what should be display as caller id for this sip uri This is the merged and fancy way fallback to uri or user name if needed
        参数:
        uri - the uri to display
        返回:
        the simple display

      • isPhoneNumber

        public static boolean isPhoneNumber(java.lang.String phone)
        Check if username is an phone tel
        参数:
        phone - username to check
        返回:
        true if look like a phone number

      • getPhoneNumber

        public static java.lang.String getPhoneNumber(SipUri.ParsedSipContactInfos uriInfos)
        Get extract a phone number from sip uri if any available
        参数:
        uriInfos - the parsed information of the uri obtained with parseSipContact(String)
        返回:
        null if no phone number detected. The phone number else.

      • getCanonicalSipContact

        public static java.lang.String getCanonicalSipContact(java.lang.String sipContact)
        Transform sip uri into something that doesn't depend on remote display name For example, if you give "Display Name" It will return sip:user@domain.com
        参数:
        sipContact - full sip uri
        返回:
        simplified sip uri

      • getCanonicalSipContact

        public static java.lang.String getCanonicalSipContact(java.lang.String sipContact,
                                                      boolean includeScheme)
        Transform sip uri into something that doesn't depend on remote display name
        参数:
        sipContact - full sip uri
        includeScheme - whether to include scheme in case of username
        返回:
        the canonical sip contact
        Example sip:user@domain.com
        or user@domain.com (if include scheme is false)

      • parseSipUri

        public static SipUri.ParsedSipUriInfos parseSipUri(java.lang.String sipUri)
        Parse an uri
        参数:
        sipUri - the uri to parse
        返回:
        parsed object

      • forgeSipUri

        public static Uri forgeSipUri(java.lang.String scheme,
                              java.lang.String contact)

      • encodeUser

        public static java.lang.String encodeUser(java.lang.String user)
